articles.title: Foreigner to be charged with vandalism after 'offensive words' spray-painted on Salvation Army premises
articles.content: The Chinese Australian woman will be charged with the offence of vandalism, police said on Friday. "The police take a very serious view of such acts, and offenders will be dealt with...
